person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cricket - Pakistan beat New Zealand by 46 runs .

| --- |
| Pakistan |
| New Zealand |

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are "Pakistan" and "New Zealand". These are the teams that are playing the cricket match, and are therefore the relevant entities to extract from the text.
